link.json
=========

**link.json** provides some utilities for JSON like:

 - JSON Schema
 - JSON Patch
 - Collection+JSON
 - ...

See documentation_ for more informations.

.. _documentation: https://linkjson.readthedocs.io

Installation
------------

.. code-block:: text

   pip install link.json
